channel.title: News - Polish Army
channel.description: News articles related to Polish Army

item.title: Mandatory Survival Training for Soldiers
item.description: Every soldier must undergo survival training to endure isolation, accidents, or enemy capture.

item.title: Polish Army's Security and Development Enhanced
item.description: The Polish Army has focused on technical modernization, building the East Shield, and bolstering alliances to enhance security.

item.title: Military Sports Gala in Warsaw
item.description: The event summarized sports and training activities at the General Command of the Armed Forces in 2024.

item.title: Soldier Arrested from 7PBOT
item.description: A soldier from the 7th Coastal Defense Brigade (7PBOT) has been arrested.
